links.source_ref: Higher defense spending from NATO members

evidence.evidence_text: Aselsan shares were nearly 300% higher from the previous year amid higher defense spending from NATO members

Banks also outperformed in the recent quarters on the stability of domestic inflation, despite remaining high, spurred by credit activity following the prolonged period of unorthodox monetary policy by the central bank.
The predictable decline in the lira has also allowed investors to use riskier assets such as equities to protect themselves against inflation.
The TCMB cut its benchmark rate by 100bps last month
but reiterated that its baseline scenario sees underlying inflation continue to slow this year.
